Job Title: Video Producer

Location: Greater Philadelphia

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Public Relations, Writing/Editing

Description:
About Creative AdBundanceWe’re a young, fast-paced digital marketing agency working across a variety of industries and a range of clients from startup to enterprise. Our mission is to be the global solution for digital creative resources.At Creative AdBundance, we’re building creative ads for Meta, TikTok and Youtube at the intersection of performance and creativity. As the digital marketing landscape evolves to restrict more data and optimization events for advertisers, creative has never been more important. We understand the delicate balance between design and performance to yield the best results for our clients.We love what we do, and we want someone who is positive and open to growth.
Job Description:We are seeking a talented and experienced Video Producer who specializes in Paid Social Advertising. This role involves creating captivating video content tailored for platforms like TikTok, Meta (Facebook and Instagram), YouTube, and other emerging social media channels. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in paid social campaigns and a knack for developing mobile-first content that resonates with diverse audiences.
Key Responsibilities:Conceptualize, develop, and produce high-quality video content specifically designed for paid social media advertising.Work closely within the Creative AdBundance team to understand campaign objectives and target demographics, ensuring content aligns with these goals.Stay abreast of trends and advancements in social media platforms, adapting content strategies to leverage new features and opportunities.Manage the entire production process, from pre-production planning to post-production editing, ensuring timely delivery of content.Collaborate with creative and strategy teams to brainstorm innovative ideas for videoAnalyze campaign performance and make data-driven recommendations for content optimization.Ensure all content is on-brand, consistent in style, quality, and tone of voice.MUST HAVE EXPERIENCE SHOOTING TIKTOK VIDEOS OR REELS
Qualifications:PLEASE SHARE A LINK TO A PORTFOLIO OR @Handle to review videosBachelor’s degree in Film, Media Production, Communications, or related field.Minimum of 1-2 years of experience in video production, with a specific focus on paid social advertising.Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro).Strong understanding of social media platforms, particularly TikTok, Meta, YouTube, and their respective audiences.Demonstrated ability to create mobile-first content that engages and captivates users.Excellent storytelling skills, with a keen eye for visual aesthetics.Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.Strong communication and collaboration skills.

Experience Level (if available): None
